pkgmetadata.longdescription: # librelingo\_json\_export.export#### export\_course```pythonexport_course(export_path: str, course: Course, settings=None)```Writes the course to JSON files in the specified path.### Usage example:```pythonfrom librelingo_yaml_loader import load_coursefrom librelingo_json_export.export import export_coursecourse = load_course("./courses/french-from-english")export_course("./apps/web/src/courses/french-from-english", course)```
